sentences.sentence: They met while she was on secondment from the Foreign Office.
sentences.translation: 两人是在她从外交部调来短期任职时认识的。

sentences.sentence: We have two full-time secretaries, one of whom is on secondment from the Royal Navy.
sentences.translation: 我们有两个全职秘书，其中一人是临时从皇家海军调来的。

sentences.sentence: Under certain conditions, the partnership may involve the secondment of corporate personnel as well.
sentences.translation: 在某些情况下，合作关系也可能需要借调企业人员。
